title: thanks for the free win Dyrus
body:
''easiest game of my life'' -xPeke 2015

get rekt FeedSM

replies.body:
BR>CLG
CLG>TSM
what does this mean
FreeSM

C9>FNC
CLG/TSM>C9
What does this mean?
FreeU.
I think you missed the point there, little guy.
The primary issue was all of Dyrus's Malphite ults never had any good follow-up to make them truly meaningful. It was TSM as a whole, not just Dyrus.
Or he ulted 1 guy with a psuedo cleanse while there were 2 hard carry's who scale heavily off of attack speed for the majority of their damage and need to be cc'd

Too bad he never ulted

:')

Lmao I love all the little kids saying "Stay salty NA" "NA so bad" "FreeSM". If anyone is salty it's you for saying that. Grow up holy shit. Half the EU players anything like that are gold/silver/bronze cry babies.
I don't know why people pick on Dyrus when the team's plan is for him to be the punching bag while Bjerg tries to carry.

Today is likely dyrus' last day of professional league before he retires. He may not be as good as he used to be, but he has had a huge impact on the league community. Besides, he is one of only two players who have gone to every single worlds tournament, which is quite an accomplishment.

holy shit these bronze- silver euw players think they are good. watch the game don't talk shit to people who are way better then you. you don't know what it is like to be on stage. and over 250k people watching.

> [{quoted}](name=blackmoma,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=L1wrEZor,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-10-10T11:39:44.345+0000)
>
> holy shit these bronze- silver euw players think they are good. watch the game don't talk shit to people who are way better then you. you don't know what it is like to be on stage. and over 250k people watching.

Salty NA right there. Anyways it was obvious dat Dyrus missplayed a lot.

Oh and ofc WildSquirtle getting caught/die too much.

The reason Dyrus misplayed was because he lacked one thing that game: his pillow.

It's his beacon of power.

> [{quoted}](name=Maszii,realm=EUW,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=L1wrEZor,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2015-10-10T14:09:55.695+0000)
>
> Salty NA right there. Anyways it was obvious dat Dyrus missplayed a lot.
> 
> Oh and ofc WildSquirtle getting caught/die too much.

Wild turtle got caught like he always does. Dyrus wouldnt peel for his team and instead ult olaf. Lust boy Would save his exhaust and ultimate, run away and watch his team die....I can't even recall when Lustboy actually ulted. Lustboy was leaving up to his meme....you sure as hell couldn't see him in a team fight, hed just flash over a wall or run away from a team fight. Lust boy would have been better as Tahm kench all he was doing was casting an E on his team mates.

OG will lose to SKT anyway
but for now..
get fistfucked TSM

> [{quoted}](name=Best Garen BR,realm=EUW,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=L1wrEZor,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2015-10-10T11:40:49.249+0000)
>
> OG will lose to SKT anyway
> but for now..
> get fistfucked TSM

Why would they be matched up with SKT? Or do you mean in the final?
Well, eventually, they're a top-tier team and likely to hit it big across the game.
It wasnt even Dyrus that threw that game... It was the shot caller for TSM they had plenty of chances to win team fights but never pulled the trigger.
he pressed R like 2 times that game. neither time was for engage purposes

incorrect he used it to engage at least 3 times. Stopped Kennens TP, Ulted 4 people in front of baron, ulted 4 people in his base. Those are the ones I can remember. Sure he did use his ult to escape a couple times but so do most malphites lol

> [{quoted}](name=Valenten,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=L1wrEZor,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-10-10T11:39:24.978+0000)
>
> incorrect he used it to engage at least 3 times. Stopped Kennens TP, Ulted 4 people in front of baron, ulted 4 people in his base. Those are the ones I can remember. Sure he did use his ult to escape a couple times but so do most malphites lol

I wouldnt even count ulting 4 ppl alone at his base....He only made 2 successful ults that game. Then later focuses his ult on a tank Olaf..Thank god he is retiring....His thirst for Olaf is beyond team play and is more Solo Q.
freesm freesm freesm
Dyrus is an idiot anyway. Thornmail vs 3 ap and a kog w/ tri? Lol that logic. shouldve went scepter or some AP item.
abys on malphite and something else on syndra. makes a lot more sense
Dyrus is absolutely fucking terrible, he keeps TSM down. There's no way around it.
OG didn't stomp TSM in 20 minutes so OG is a horrible team as well

Actually, I think we just witnessed the greatest troll in LOL history. This was planned by at least Dyrus if not the whole TSM team. How else can you explain the Malph ult on a fleeing low health Olaf while he was standing next to Azir and Jinx. Further proof can be found by the Malph ult of a Reksai who was stunned by Veig and almost dead as well.  Dyrus and possibly TSM pulled off the greatest troll plays in the history of Worlds.
who ever was the shot caller wanted to wait for OG to make mistakes instead of trying to make plays...it was horrible...
the whole team played bad.
noobSM

Dyrus has needed to be replaced for a long time. If Regi ever wants TSM to be competitive in Worlds they need to have a top laner that can hard carry....like idk HUNI or SOAZ. And then they wonder how teams can gameplan against them when THEY KNOW SDSYRUS IS NOT GOING TO EVER BE A THREAT. Fking logic is real.
